abstract.p: This document, number twenty in Carlo Conti Rossini's edition (and therefore CCR 20 according to Bausi's reference). The document is attested twice, once it follows immediately CCR 19 and followed by CCR 21 . Further, this document was apparently copied with some insignificant changes into a small quire, which contains a number of documents likely copied from older documents (originals?) in the sixteenth century.
